        Constructs a new Variable.

        s - The string to parse.
        Throws:
        If - s is null, doesn't contain exactly one char, or the one char is not A-Z or a-z.

      • parseable

        public static boolean parseable(java.lang.String s)
        Tells if s is parseable as a variable. Must contain one char, a-z or A-Z.
        Parameters:
        s - The string to check.
        Returns:
        If s is a variable.
